name: Pacbase: Avoid Large Online Programs (excluding macros) - too many Lines of Code (-P)
description: Large programs are more difficult to read and manage. The higher number of Line of Code is 700, corresponding to three -P screens.`!xA!`The threshold for the number of lines of code is configurable at will.
output: Nb of online programs with more than X LOC in -P`!xA!`Value : Nb of LOC in -P
rationale: Large programs are more difficult to read and manage. The higher number of Line of Code is 700, corresponding to three -P screens.`!xA!`The threshold for the number of lines of code is configurable at will.
